author: ryanleeschneider
content: I wont be on the call but RE: Goerli validators, can someone confirm that for _existing_ Clique validators there's nothing to do?  And when we should shut down our Clique validator (I assume anytime after the first merge epoch is finalized is ok but want to confirm).

author: trent_vanepps
content: bumping this again - this event is in the Protocol Call calendar, but if anyone (eg. client contributors) would like to be added to this event, DM me your email and I will add it!
